title: Personalized Language Education Design Using MOOCs: Inclusive Access Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in elementary education settings and basic proficiency in using MOOC platforms
context.additional_context: Large-scale asynchronous online course operating in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment, aimed at strengthening language education competencies for in-service elementary teachers

learning_goals: Three or more strategies for designing personalized language education utilizing MOOCs' personalization features can be proposed
MOOC content development strategies reflecting diverse learner needs based on inclusive education principles can be established
Mobile-friendly assessment tools (e.g., project templates) executable in limited technology environments can be created

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
